hero.title: Waver AI Video Generator
hero.description: Experience next-generation AI video creation with Waver AI Video Generator, the revolutionary All-in-One foundation model that simultaneously supports text-to-video, image-to-video, and text-to-image generation using rectified flow Transformers. Ranked Top 3 globally on both T2V and I2V leaderboards, create professional-quality videos (5-10 seconds, up to 1080p) with breakthrough motion capabilities and native multi-camera storytelling.

whatIs.title: What is Waver AI Video Generator?
whatIs.description: Waver AI Video Generator is a next-generation universal foundation model built on rectified flow Transformers, engineered for industry-grade performance. This All-in-One framework simultaneously handles text-to-video (T2V), image-to-video (I2V), and text-to-image (T2I) generation within a single integrated model. Delivering 1080p high-resolution videos with flexible lengths (5-10 seconds), Waver excels at complex motion capture including sports and large-scale movements, ranking Top 3 on Artificial Analysis leaderboards while matching or exceeding state-of-the-art commercial solutions.

examples.title: Waver AI Video Generator Examples
examples.description: Witness breakthrough motion modeling showcasing Waver AI's native multi-camera capabilities, complex sports movements, and diverse artistic styles from photorealistic to animated sequences.

howToUse.title: How to use Waver AI Video Generator

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.content: Upload your image or enter a text prompt to begin video generation using Waver's All-in-One T2V and I2V capabilities.

steps.title: Enter a Prompt
steps.content: Describe your desired motion, animations, or scene dynamics in detail for optimal results.

steps.title: Generate Dynamic Video
steps.content: Click 'Generate' and let Waver's rectified flow Transformers create your professional-quality video in 5 or 10 seconds.

steps.title: Download and Share
steps.content: Review and download your generated video in 1080p HD format to share or use in your projects.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn about Waver AI Video Generator's All-in-One capabilities, rectified flow technology, and breakthrough motion modeling features.
faq.q1: What is Waver AI Video Generator?
faq.a1: Waver AI Video Generator is an All-in-One foundation model that simultaneously supports text-to-video, image-to-video, and text-to-image generation using rectified flow Transformers. Ranked Top 3 globally on both T2V and I2V leaderboards, it delivers 1080p videos (5-10 seconds) with breakthrough motion capabilities, excelling at complex sports and large-scale movements.
faq.q2: How to create videos with Waver AI Video Generator?
faq.a2: Using Waver AI Video Generator is simple! First, choose between T2V or I2V mode and upload your image or enter text. Then, describe your desired motion or scene dynamics in detail. Finally, select your duration (5 or 10 seconds) and resolution (up to 1080p), and let our rectified flow Transformers generate professional-quality videos.
faq.q3: How does Waver AI Video Generator work?
faq.a3: Waver AI Video Generator uses rectified flow Transformers with Dual Stream + Single Stream architecture to process inputs. It works by employing Wan-VAE compression, flan-t5-xxl and Qwen2.5-32B text encoders, and cascade refiner technology for 1080p generation, achieving superior motion modeling through advanced flow matching and sigma shift techniques.
faq.q4: What is the best All-in-One video generator?
faq.a4: KomikoAI provides the best All-in-One video generator tool. Our goal is to be the leading AI creation platform by delivering professional-quality results, powerful and fun customization, and an intuitive workflowâ€”completely free to try. With KomikoAI's Waver AI Video Generator, you can leverage Top 3 ranked technology for T2V and I2V generation with breakthrough motion capabilities, making it perfect for users who demand superior motion quality and multi-camera storytelling.
faq.q5: Is the KomikoAI Waver AI Video Generator free online?
faq.a5: Yes, you can test out the Waver AI Video Generator on KomikoAI for free, without having to sign up to any subscription. Try our powerful All-in-One video generation tool today!
faq.q6: What can I do with Waver AI Video Generator?
faq.a6: You can use Waver AI Video Generator on KomikoAI to create complex sports animations, generate multi-camera narratives, produce videos in diverse artistic styles, animate product demonstrations, bring photographs to life with realistic motion, create educational content with dynamic visualizations, and generate professional marketing videos with superior motion quality.
faq.q7: Can I use Waver AI Video Generator on my phone?
faq.a7: Yes, you can use Waver AI Video Generator as a web app on different devices, including smartphones and computers, making it convenient for everyone.
faq.q8: Can I download my generation from Waver AI Video Generator?
faq.a8: Yes, KomikoAI's Waver AI Video Generator allows you to export your generation in professional 1080p HD quality with flexible aspect ratios, perfect for sharing across social media platforms, commercial applications, and professional presentations.
faq.q9: Why should I use Waver AI Video Generator?
faq.a9: Using Waver AI Video Generator revolutionizes content creation with its All-in-One capabilities ranked Top 3 globally. Our rectified flow Transformers deliver breakthrough motion modeling for complex sports and actions, native multi-camera storytelling, and diverse artistic stylesâ€”all with 1080p quality and 5-10 second durations, eliminating traditional production costs while exceeding industry standards.

examples.title: Model: Waver 1.0
examples.description: Prompt: A male figure skater wearing a light blue patterned shirt and black pants glides across a brightly lit ice rink. He begins in a medium shot, arms extended gracefully, and bends his knees as he gains speed. The skater then spins on one foot, his shirt catching the light from the overhead spotlights. He transitions into a low jump, landing smoothly and continuing to glide forward. The background remains dark, with the audience visible in the shadows and stage lights illuminating the ice. The camera remains steady, capturing the skaterâ€™s fluid movements and the shimmering reflections on the ice.

examples.title: Model: Waver 1.0
examples.description: Prompt: The video features a close-up shot of a beautiful young woman with long, dark, textured hair, wearing a gray hoodie pulled over her head and open at the front. She stands outdoors on a sunny day, with natural sunlight highlighting the crisp, detailed texture of her hair and the fine weave of the hoodie fabric. The woman's blue eyes are clear and striking, and her plump lips are visible beneath the hood. She gently lifts her right hand to adjust the edge of her hoodie, tucking a loose strand of hair behind her ear. The woman then lowers her hand and tilts her head slightly to the left, causing the sunlight to catch the textured strands of her hair. She smiles softly, her expression relaxed and natural. The background remains softly blurred, focusing attention on her detailed features and the sharpness of the image. The camera remains steady and centered throughout the video, capturing the subtle movements and the high clarity of the scene.

examples.title: Model: Waver 1.0
examples.description: Prompt: This video showcases a hyper-realistic anime scene in the style of Shinkai Makoto. The shot is an ultra low-angle, fixed camera positioned behind a teenage boy skateboarding at extremely high speed down a winding mountain road. The boy wears a loose white shirt and faded blue jeans, with his brown hair tousled by the wind. His arms are spread wide and his knees are bent in a natural skateboarding posture. As he carves along the curving asphalt, his shirt and hair flutter dramatically in the wind. Flower petals and wind particles swirl around him, catching the cinematic sunlight and casting strong, dynamic shadows on the road. The vivid blue ocean stretches out in the distance beneath a sky filled with scattered clouds. The boy leans into each turn, shifting his weight smoothly as the skateboard wheels grip the pavement. The background remains stable, with the ocean view and mountain greenery providing a breathtaking backdrop. The camera remains fixed, never panning or cutting, capturing the continuous, exhilarating descent.

examples.title: Model: Waver 1.0
examples.description: Prompt: A gray haired old lady sat on a rocking chair in the yard to cool off, staring at the TV in front of her. Suddenly, a little cat jumped into the arms of the old lady and then onto her head.

examples.description: Prompt: a teenage boy grows into an old man, rapidly going through a number of outfits corresponding to the age.
